languages.text: {n}Друкари бросает на вас ненавидящий взгляд.{/n} "Надо сказать, Назракею не требовалось много труда обернуть суд против меня — не после того, что ты устроил{mf||а} перед собранием архонтов".

{n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари бросает на вас ненавидящий взгляд.{/n} "Надо сказать, Назракею не требовалось много труда обернуть суд против меня — не после того, что ты устроил{mf||а} перед собранием архонтов".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari te lanza una mirada cargada de odio.{/n} «Debo decir que Nazrakhei no tuvo que esforzarse mucho por volver a la corte en mi contra, no después de la jugada que hiciste delante de los Arcontes congregados».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari te lanza una mirada cargada de odio.{/n} «Debo decir que Nazrakhei no tuvo que esforzarse mucho por volver a la corte en mi contra, no después de la jugada que hiciste delante de los Arcontes congregados».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋向你投来充满恨意的目光。{/n}“不得不说，你在那群执政官们面前耍了那个小伎俩之后，纳札骸没费多大力气，就让所有人都对我不利。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋向你投来充满恨意的目光。{/n}“不得不说，你在那群执政官们面前耍了那个小伎俩之后，纳札骸没费多大力气，就让所有人都对我不利。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは憎しみに満ちた目線をあなたに向ける。{/n}「俺に不利になるよう法廷を動かすのに、ナズラクヘイはさほど苦労しなかっただろうな。お前が集まったアーコンの目の前で大騒ぎをした後だったから、なおのことだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは憎しみに満ちた目線をあなたに向ける。{/n}「俺に不利になるよう法廷を動かすのに、ナズラクヘイはさほど苦労しなかっただろうな。お前が集まったアーコンの目の前で大騒ぎをした後だったから、なおのことだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari vous adresse un regard haineux.{/n} « Il faut bien reconnaître qu'il n'a pas eu à se donner beaucoup de mal pour retourner la cour contre moi... pas après la petite comédie que vous avez jouée devant les archontes assemblés. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari vous adresse un regard haineux.{/n} « Il faut bien reconnaître qu'il n'a pas eu à se donner beaucoup de mal pour retourner la cour contre moi... pas après la petite comédie que vous avez jouée devant les archontes assemblés. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari wirft dir einen hasserfüllten Blick zu.{/n} "Man muss sagen, dass Nazrakhei sich keine große Mühe geben musste, um das Gericht gegen mich aufzubringen — nicht nach Eurem Auftritt vor den versammelten Archonten."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."

languages.text: {n}Drukhari sana nefret dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Nazrakhei'in mahkemeyi aleyhime çevirmesi de hiç zor olmadı bu arada. Arkon meclisinin önünde yaptıkların sağ olsun."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari tosses a hate-filled look at you.{/n} "It must be said that Nazrakhei did not have to try very hard to turn the court against me — not after the stunt you pulled before the assembled Archons."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari sana nefret dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Nazrakhei'in mahkemeyi aleyhime çevirmesi de hiç zor olmadı bu arada. Arkon meclisinin önünde yaptıkların sağ olsun."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
